Title: Amazon Has Made a Robot With a Sense of Touch
Description: Vulcan, a robot with tactile senses, is a step towards automating more of picking and stowing work done by humans inside Amazon’s fulfillment centers.

Title: Matter’s latest update brings tap-to-pair setup
Description:
Two new features coming to Matter are designed to make setting up smart gadgets easier.
Multi-device QR codes and a tap-to-pair onboarding via NFC are new options for adding devices like smart lights, plugs, locks, and more to a Matter home network.
The updat…

Title: Joe Biden on Trump: 'What president ever talks like that? That's not who we are'
Description: The former president on his successor's first 100 days and his "grave concern" for the future of the Atlantic Alliance

Title: Google app on iOS gets a new feature that will 'Simplify' text online
Description: Simplify will spot jargon or technical concepts and make them understandable for the user.

Title: Google's May 2025 Pixel update is here with bug fixes and a critical security patch
Description: If you have a Google Pixel device, check for the May 2025 security patch immediately — it includes must-install, zero-day fixes.

Title: Fed Plans to Pause Interest Rate Cuts, Again. Here's Why You Should Care
Description: Tariffs are threatening higher inflation, and that's putting pressure on the Fed to keep borrowing costs high.

Title: SCOTUS upholds Trump's transgender military ban. And, the papal conclave begins
Description:
The Supreme Court has allowed the Trump Administration to start executing its ban on trans military service members.
And, the conclave to elect the Catholic Church's new leader begins today.

Title: Word of the Week: Before the Birdman of Alcatraz, the island was known for its birds
Description: The origin story of Alcatraz's name is a complicated mix of language, a history that dates back to the first Europeans to explore the coast of California, and, a flock of seabirds.

Title: Amazon's Zoox Robotaxi Unit Issues Software Recall After Recent Las Vegas Crash
Description:
Amazon's Zoox said it has issued a software recall for 270 of its robotaxis after a crash in Las Vegas last month.
CNBC reports: The recall surrounds a defect with the vehicle's automated driving system that could cause it to inaccurately predict the movement…

Title: Biden said Trump's pressure on Ukraine to give up territory to Russia is 'modern-day appeasement'
Description: In his first interview since leaving the White House, Biden told the BBC that Trump's approach to Russia is 'modern-day appeasement' that won't work.

Title: Some importers are looking to park their stuff in a special type of warehouse until Trump makes up his mind on tariffs
Description: Demand for bonded warehousing, in which cargo is exempt from tariffs for up to five years, skyrocketed in April, according to Flexe data shared with BI.

Title: Even Marvel has superhero fatigue. Its 'Thunderbolts*' marketing appeals to a new audience: cinephiles.
Description: Marvel has referenced the industry darling A24 in its "Thunderbolts*" advertising, and nodded to stunt-heavy movies like "Mission Impossible." Will it be enough to cure superhero fatigue?

Title: Exclusive: Eyeo exits stealth to give cameras human-like colour vision
Description:
Dutch startup Eyeo has emerged from stealth with €15mn in funding to advance a breakthrough photonics technology for cameras that could radically disrupt the way we take images.
Eyeo spun out last year from Belgium’s Imec, one of the world’s leading nanoelect…

Title: Elite Palm Beach Fire-Rescue team takes part in statewide rescue competition
Description: The specialized team competed May 1 at the Palm Beach State Invitational at Palm Beach State College.

Title: The Arts of the Deal
Description: Are NEA grant recipients the next to fall by the chainsaw?

Title: EA Bucks Industry Trend And Says It Has No Plans to Increase Video Game Prices
Description: Publisher/ developer EA has confirmed it has no plans to raise the price of its games even as the likes of Microsoft and Nintendo jump to $80.

Title: The Surprising History of Romantic Advice
Description: A 17th-century column shows that dating has always been an anxiety-riddled endeavor.

Title: 'Why would we play Putin's game?': Ukrainians see Russian lull as sideshow
Description: Russia is expected to begin a self-declared three-day pause in fighting against Ukraine on Wednesday night.
